attributes.action: Create on site parking for hospital staff at the Norfolk and Norwich hospital
attributes.additional_details: Safety and time. Currently some staff are working 12.5 hour shifts (that’s if they leave on time), they are then having to travel via the park and ride bus to the Costessey car park which not only makes them feel unsafe and vulnerable at night time when it is dark and quiet but also adds extensive travel time on to their already long day as they have to leave home earlier to make sure they are on time for the right bus to take them into the hospital for their shift.
attributes.background: Create a staff car park for hospital staff at the Norfolk and Norwich Hospital

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the NHS Trust.
